emuInput.TitMainTitle: Donald Warden and Bobbie Green Turner wearing African style clothing, seated on wooden bench in the Flying Carpet for Alpha Kappa Alpha for "Ajoyo"
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 10, 1967, pg. 17, reads: "Special Guest - Former Pittsburgher, Donald Warden, a successful lawyer in California flew up from San Francisco to be a special guest at the AKA's "Ajoyo" Warden, an attorney of international renown, was recently elected to the Dictionary of International Biography. He presented Mrs. Bobbie Green Turner with an African garment manufactured by Dignity Enterprises in California.  Both Warden and Mrs. Turner were among the prize winners."
